Instructions:
• Review History & Company Overview.
• Identify Basics of electronic components.
• Learn Packaging terminology and part numbers.
• Introduction to Arrow.com and Verical.com services.

• Create an account on arrow.com.
• Execute part search and add to cart.
• Complete Secure Check out process.
• Perform Password reset for Arrow.com/Verical.com.
• Read website key details and FAQs.

• Perform Verical.com website overview.
• Follow steps to check out on verical.com.
• Manage Verical account settings.
• Read verical.com FAQs.

• Pin Salesforce tabs for quick access.
• Manage and track Salesforce cases.
• Use quick texts in chats for efficiency.
• Submit tickets for Salesforce technical issues.
• Merge Salesforce cases.
• Create tasks for collaboration.

• Quote parts in stock for Arrow or Verical.
• Process No bid quotes.
• Follow the Quick guide on RFQs.

• Perform Part search in Oracle.
• Execute Back Order quoting and entry process.
• Create and submit a QLR.
• Search for customers in Oracle.
• Create new customer accounts.
• Create new bill-to and ship-to sites.
• Use canned emails for communications.

• Navigate and search orders in Oracle.
• Use OMT Ninja screens.
• Check the status of Oracle sales orders.
• Process Order Entry for different payment methods.
• Review payments to verify them.
• Download invoices.
• Unassign delivery and shipping details.

• Identify third-party suppliers and PO flow.
• Locate and identify alerts on orders.
• Review and resolve Line alerts.
• Add lines to booked orders and update quantity.
• Perform PO line quantity confirmation.
• Manage EMEA Drop Ship, Crossdock, and ADI Factory Stock processes.
• Perform Data correction requests.
• Change shipping addresses and methods on the CMF.

• Upload and validate Resale tax certificates.
• Verify VAT ID requirements.
• Manage Trade Compliance holds and actions to release.
• Navigate CyberSource and identify account collectors.
• Process Wire, Credit Card, and PayPal refunds in SWB.
• Request Credit Limit increases and link Lines of Credit.

• Request Packing Lists, Delivery Notes, or C of Cs.
• Use Connect Now/ETQ to request order cancellations.
• Identify Spark and Talkdesk tools.
• Follow Customer Verification & Privacy rules for calls/chats.
• Apply basic etiquette tips for customer service.
